entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, mentioned as the one who killed Harry's father and wants to kill Harry. ("I killed your father first and he put up a courageous fight... Now give me the Stone, unless you want her to have died in vain.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist, mentioned as the one who is being threatened by Voldemort. ("Harry sprang towards the flame door... 'NEVER!' Harry sprang towards the flame door...")

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: A character who is possessed by Voldemort and is trying to seize Harry. ("Quirrell's hand close on his wrist.")

entities.name: stone
entities.description: An object that Voldemort wants from Harry. ("Now give me the Stone...")

relationships.description: Voldemort is threatening to kill Harry if he doesn't get the Stone. ("Now give me the Stone, unless you want her to have died in vain.")
Voldemort possesses Quirrell and is using him to try and seize Harry. ("Quirrell's hand close on his wrist.")
Harry has the Stone, which Voldemort wants. ("Now give me the Stone...")
Quirrell is controlled by Voldemort and is trying to seize Harry on his behalf. ("Voldemort screamed, 'SEIZE HIM!'...")
